plot: One fateful Friday, in a London office just like any other; decades of pressure and frustration beget a thing of pure malevolence. One man is working late. One man is drinking hard. Will either survive?
title: Work Hard Play Hard
plot_es: One fateful Friday, in a London office just like any other; decades of pressure and frustration beget a thing of pure malevolence. One man is working late. One man is drinking hard. Will either survive?
plot_en: One fateful Friday, in a London office just like any other; decades of pressure and frustration beget a thing of pure malevolence. One man is working late. One man is drinking hard. Will either survive?
